The **helm of madness** is a type of [magical](/wiki/Magical_item "Magical item") [helm](/wiki/Helm "Helm") that appears in *[Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM")*. It has a [randomized appearance](/wiki/Randomized_appearance "Randomized appearance"),

## Description

When worn, the helm grants 1 AC, +3 charisma, and extrinsic [hallucination](/wiki/Hallucination "Hallucination"). It will also [auto-identify](/wiki/Auto-identify "Auto-identify").

The helm auto-curses on wear. It is also usually generated cursed.
